turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Really hungry, so hoping to do a pickup for pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, sorry. Bella Luna pizzeria, I think they're the closest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah no problem, and how many did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Going to get three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One veggie lovers, one with extra cheese, and a third with ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 medium pizzas, one veggie lovers, one extra cheese and one ham for 68 93, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All three of them with gluten-free crust, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: GOt it, gluten free crust on all three changes the total to $69.69.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. I will pick that up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready in 30 minutes and you'll get a text reciept.
